bmi.question: Is your BMI under or over 40?

injuries-under14-BMI-under-40.question: Do you have epiphysiolysis of the proximal humerus ('Little League Shoulder'), tendonitis, or impingement syndrome?

injuries-under14-BMI-over-40.question: Do you have ankle sprains, epiphysiolysis of the proximal humerus ('Little League Shoulder'), or impingement syndrome?

injuries-14-60-BMI-under-40.question: Do you any bicep tears, hamstring strains, tendonitis, lower back pain, or knee injuries?

injuries-14-60-BMI-over-40.question: Do you any bicep tears, hamstring strains, tendonitis, or lower back pain?

injuries-over61-BMI-under-40.question: Do you have any back pain, hamstring injuries, stress fractures, or kneecap pain?

injuries-over61-BMI-over-40.question: Do you have any fractures or sprains?
